::Shredder::

Shredder nods, a few thoughts flashing through his mind. He was second-in-command of this faction, and he would stay, of course. However, if things turned bad, he could always go back. Second in command status wasn't something he was willing to give up, though.

"Allright, I'm off. I won't answer Magmatron."

He walks out of the base, blasting off toward Alliance Island at full blast after doing a short scanner sweep for Halucigen.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Galvatron heard the signal and smiled. he turned to Shredder. "Ignore that 
> order. We will work with them but we have our own plans right now."
